Default_MSSQL_Checks.parameters: -q -x 'use auxiliary/scanner/mssql/mssql_login; set rhosts {host} ; set rport {port} ; run; exit'

Web_Server_Auto_Complete_Checks.parameters: curl --silent -L -i http://{host}:{port} | grep -i autocomplete || (echo '_' && curl --silent -k -L -i https://{host}:{port} | grep -i autocomplete || echo '_')

Insecure_NLA_Checks.parameters: -q -x 'use auxiliary/scanner/rdp/rdp_scanner; set rhosts {host} ; set rport {port} ; run; exit'

IKE_Metasploit_Checks.parameters: -q -x 'use auxiliary/scanner/ike/cisco_ike_benigncertain; set rhosts {host} ; set rport {port} ; run; exit'

Puppet_enterprise_Checks.parameters: curl --silent -L -i http://{host}:{port} | grep -i puppet || (echo '_' && curl --silent -k -L -i https://{host}:{port} | grep -i puppet || echo '_')

IPMI_Metasploit_Checks.parameters: -q -x 'use auxiliary/scanner/ipmi/ipmi_dumphashes; set rhosts {host} ; set rport {port} ; run; exit'

Hashicorp_API_Checks.parameters: curl --silent -L -i http://{host}:{port} | grep -i Hashicorp || (echo '_' && curl --silent -k -L -i https://{host}:{port} | grep -i Hashicorp || echo '_')

jQuery_Checks.parameters: curl --silent -L -i http://{host}:{port} | grep -i jquery || (echo '_' && curl --silent -k -L -i https://{host}:{port} | grep -i jquery || echo '_')
